title: for development of the reservations in the Development Plans designated for the purpose other than residential
clause_text: for development of the reservations in the Development Plans designated for the purpose other than residential. for the uses other than Residential, Industrial and Educational permissible in Agricultural zone.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
